item.title: Reflecting on the Why (of this Site)
item.description: by Law Aritao Reflections on Why I want to explore why I am doing this blog and why I consider Hugo and Github pages a great choice. Why Hugo and Github Pages? In the past twelve months, I explored Wordpress, Ghost, Wix, Wordpress/Ghost on various platforms: Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services, Azure, Linode, Digital Ocean, and Vultr. I also tried creating a static site and hosting it on Amazon Amplify.
